title: Gone Viral: The Germs that Share Our Lives (2012) {=IMPAVIDUS=}

Book Description:

Featuring 15 infectious diseasesÃ¢â‚¬â€eight bacteria, six viruses, and a parasiteÃ¢â‚¬â€and one friendly fungus, this book explores significant medical themes and highlights the effect micro-organisms have on modern life. Hilarious, informative, yet deeply moving, it discusses each disease while weaving true stories of patients and their families and the difficulties doctors face.
